mapper.sql: id, orderId, userId, withdrawType, bankNo, accname, orderStatus, bankName, amount, fee, actualAmount, mobile, notify, createTime, submitTime, status, retain1, retain2,witType
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from alipay_withdraw
order by ${orderByClause}
